version_description:
- Monthly account statements
- iOS 10 Deprecation
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

-Ability to remember email on the login screen.
-Ability to turn on biometric authentication from login screen.
-Extending Customer Support during user on boarding.
-Real time availability of customer support call back time.
Introducing Feedback form to allow users to request new features and app improvements.
Bug fix on customer support flow.

• Updated transaction details
• Improved alerting system
• Bug fixes
With this app release, users will be able to initiate calls to customer support instead of waiting for a call back.
With this app release, users will be able to filter their transaction history by specific dates making it easier to find information and details about past transactions.

- Introducing a feature education module that helps new Lyft Direct users learn more about the product
- Improved help knowledge-base for pre-authorizations and pending transactions

- With this app release, we are making changes to the dashboard so you can learn out about new and exciting features. We have also updated the rewards section so you are updated on the latest cash back reward categories.
